thread.title: Rihanna steps out in biker chic ensemble
thread.title_full: Rihanna steps out in biker chic ensemble | Daily Mail Online

author: Ross Mcdonagh For Dailymail.com
title: Rihanna steps out in biker chic ensemble
text:
She has eight Grammy Awards, twelve Billboard Music Awards, a Fashion Icon lifetime achievement award, 200 million worldwide records sales, and a day named after her in Barbados.
But Rihanna only really considered herself successful as of Thursday night, when after Mariah Carey tried on a pair of her shoes.
The diva posted her most Mariah Carey picture of the year so far, as she worked out in a gym wearing a Letterman jacket, corset-style bodysuit, fishnet stockings... and a pair of FENTYxPUMA lace-up heels.
'Yo I made it!' Rihanna steps out in biker chic ensemble... after celebrating Mariah Carey wearing her Fenty heels to the GYM
'Yo I made it!!! @mariahcarey in #FENTYxPUMA' the Barbadian excitedly captioned as she reposted the pic.
Riri meanwhile was making fashion statements of her own as she headed for a night out in New York City.
She rocked a biker chic ensemble in a moto leather jacket, black jeans and shiny silver stilettos.
So Mariah Carey: Rihanna delightedly reposted Mariah Carey's Instagram pic of her working out in her heels
With her hair in a tight bun and her lips in a bold red, the singer finished the look off in an enormous pair of gold hoop earrings.
In a 2015 interview with I-D.vice.com , Rihanna admitted the song that made her want to pursue a career in music was Mariah's Vision Of Love.
For her part Mariah - who's not averse to dishing out shade to lesser mortals - only had good things to say about the Good Girl Gone Bad when she was informed of that fact.
Hell's angel: She rocked a biker chic ensemble in a moto leather jacket, black jeans and shiny silver stilettos
Go hell for leather in Rihanna's Balenciaga biker jacket £2680.43 Balenciaga Swing leather biker jacket
Get it at Net-a-Porter!
Buy now
Rihanna was spotted out and about in New York this week rocking a Trapstar tracksuit teamed with a Balenciaga biker jacket. The sassy songstress then accessorised her look with a pair of glittery d’Orsay heels and a Celine handbag.
A biker jacket is a modern day wardrobe staple and it’s well worth investing in one that will stand the test of time. And we definitely have our eye on Rihanna's one which is by Balanciaga.
The so-called 'swing' jacket featured a classic biker silhouette and a cropped waist. If you love it as much as us the good news is it's available to buy online now at the US version of Net-a-Porter.
Follow the link on the right to get it now, or get the look for less with one of the picks from our edit of alternatives in the carousel below, including options from AllSaints, ASOS, Weekday and Tosphop.

Hot: With her hair in a tight bun and her lips in a bold red, the singer finished the look off in an enormous pair of gold hoop earrings
'It's really cool. She's amazing, love her. She's such a great girl and really talented. It's such a huge compliment, so I appreciate that.'
The two superstars currently hold second and third place among the artists with the most ever number-ones on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100; Rihanna with 14 and Mariah with 18.
Only the Beatles have more, with 20.
Queens: The two superstars (pictured at the VEVO launch in 2009) currently hold second and third place among the artists with the most ever number-ones on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100; Rihanna with 14 and Mariah with 18
